last_episode_to_air.name: Graveyard of Fools
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Earthlings become involved with twin brothers who are plotting to take over the planet.

name: Land of the Giants
overview: Set fifteen years in the then-future year 1983, the series tells the tale of the crew and passengers of a sub-orbital transport ship named Spindrift. In the pilot episode, the Spindrift is en route from Los Angeles to London, on an ultra-fast sub-orbital flight. Just beyond Earth's boundary with space, the Spindrift encounters a magnetic space storm, and is dragged through a space warp to a mysterious planet where everything is twelve times larger than on Earth, whose inhabitants the Earthlings nickname "the Giants". The Spindrift crash-lands, and the damage renders it inoperable.

episodes.name: The Crash
episodes.overview: The Spindrift crashes on the Land of the Giants and its crew and passengers quickly find themselves in a struggle for survival.

episodes.name: Ghost Town
episodes.overview: The Earthlings find themselves trapped in an Earth-sized town run by a giant eccentric and his sadistic daughter.

episodes.name: Framed
episodes.overview: When a giant hobo is framed for murder, the Earthlings come to his aid.

episodes.name: Underground
episodes.overview: The Earthlings become involved in an underground resistance in the giant civilization.

episodes.name: Terror-Go-Round
episodes.overview: Barry and Fitzhugh are captured by giant Gypsies.

episodes.name: The Flight Plan
episodes.overview: The Spindrift crew find an amnesiac Earthling, Joe, but it turns out to be a ploy by giant crooks to get hold of the ship's power supply.

episodes.name: Manhunt
episodes.overview: A giant escaping convict takes the Spindrift but then wanders into quicksand, endangering everyone.

episodes.name: The Trap
episodes.overview: The Earthlings try to salvage radium from a clock but find themselves at the mercy of giant scientists using a sound detector to home in on them.

episodes.name: The Creed
episodes.overview: Barry is strick by appendicitis and the Earthlings have no choice but to turn to a giant doctor for assistance.

episodes.name: Double-Cross
episodes.overview: An amnesiac Fitzhugh falls in with two giant thieves and becomes their willing accomplice.

episodes.name: The Weird World
episodes.overview: The Spindrift crew finds a paranoid survivor from Earth...but his suspicions endanger everyone.

episodes.name: The Golden Cage
episodes.overview: Mark falls for an attractive Earth girl - the survivor of a previous space flight.

episodes.name: The Lost Ones
episodes.overview: This time around, four punk kids from Earth run up against the Spindrift crew.

episodes.name: Brainwash
episodes.overview: The Giants have invented a chemical that forces those exposed to it to tell the truth, and plan to test it on the Earthlings.

episodes.name: The Bounty Hunter
episodes.overview: When the giants increase their search efforts, the Earthlings must increase their salvage efforts and end up captured by a giant and his daughter.

episodes.name: On a Clear Day You Can See Earth
episodes.overview: The Earthlings become involved with an insane giant scientist who has infra-red goggles he can use to find them whenever he wants.

episodes.name: Deadly Lodestone
episodes.overview: The Giants have invented a detector that can home in on Earth-based metals, and Dan puts the entire group at risk due to the surgical pin in his leg.

episodes.name: Night of Thrombeldinbar
episodes.overview: Fitzhugh pretends to be an elf to entertain two orphan children, but things turn deadly when it's revealed that traditionally the children sacrifice the elf to make a wish come true.

episodes.name: Seven Little Indians
episodes.overview: Kobick uses a captured Chipper as bait in a trap to capture the entire Spindrift crew.

episodes.name: Target: Earth
episodes.overview: Mark is roped into helping two giant scientists build a spaceship that can return them all to Earth.

episodes.name: Genius at Work
episodes.overview: A giant boy-genius comes up with a pill that can enlarge an Earthling to Giant-size.

guest_stars.character: Giant Small Man Shoved by FitzHugh
guest_stars.name: Vic Perrin

episodes.name: Return of Inidu
episodes.overview: The Earthlings come to the aid of a giant magician.

episodes.name: Rescue
episodes.overview: After the Earthlings are inadvertently responsible for two children becoming trapped in a well, they volunteer their servicse to rescue them.

episodes.name: Sabotage
episodes.overview: The Spindrift crew must deal with the head of Police Security, who is attempting to undermine a Senator who believes in their cause and frame the Earthlings for sabotage.

episodes.name: Shell Game
episodes.overview: The Earthlings come to the aid of a giant deaf boy and his poverty-stricken family.

episodes.name: The Chase
episodes.overview: Inspector Kobick of the SID involves the Earthlings in a plan to track down counterfeiters.

episodes.name: The Mechanical Man
episodes.overview: The Earthlings become involved in a scientist's scheme to build an indestructible android.

episodes.name: Six Hours to Live
episodes.overview: The Earthlings come to the aid of a convicted criminal who has been falsely accused.

episodes.name: The Inside Rail
episodes.overview: Fitzhugh tries to use his gambling expertise to pick the winners at a local racetrack, but has to enter into a deal with a giant to do so.

episodes.name: Deadly Pawn
episodes.overview: The Earthlings must play a game of real-life chess with a demented giant industrialist.

episodes.name: The Unsuspected
episodes.overview: Steve is turned into a raving paranoid by exposure to mushroom spores, and cuts a deal with Inspector Kobick to betray his crewmates.

episodes.name: Giants and All That Jazz
episodes.overview: The Earthlings aid a giant trumpet player against crooks.

episodes.name: Collector's Item
episodes.overview: Valerie is forced to act as a toy ballerina in a giant's scheme to kill his rich uncle.

episodes.name: Every Dog Needs a Boy
episodes.overview: When Chipper is injured by a giant dog, Barry and the others must turn to a giant veterinarian and his sadistic son for assistance.

episodes.name: Chamber of Fear
episodes.overview: Fitzhugh is captured by the owner of a wax museum who is involved in a stolen-diamond racket.

episodes.name: Comeback
episodes.overview: The Spindrift come to the aid of a has-been horror actor but during his comeback movie they find themselves in danger from his enthusiastic director.

episodes.name: The Clones
episodes.overview: A giant scientist performs cloning experiments on the Earthlings.

episodes.name: A Place Called Earth
episodes.overview: Two time travellers from 5477 come to the Land of the Giants to conquer Earth.

episodes.name: Land of the Lost
episodes.overview: Barry and Valerie are carried off in a balloon to a distant land ruled by a malevolent dictator.

episodes.name: Home Sweet Home
episodes.overview: Fitzhugh and Steve accidentally return to Earth in a space-time pod but end up in 1900 and must deal with hostile villagers.

episodes.name: Our Man O'Reilly
episodes.overview: The Earthlings become involved with a superstitious Irish Giant who believes they're leprechauns.

episodes.name: Nightmare
episodes.overview: While working with a helpful Giant scientist, the Earthlings are subjected to radiation which causes strange hallucinations.

episodes.name: Pay the Piper
episodes.overview: An alien piper, claiming to be the Pied Piper of Hamlin, brings his act to the Land of the Giants.

episodes.name: The Secret City of Limbo
episodes.overview: The Earthlings become involved in the politics of a secret underground city.

episodes.name: Panic
episodes.overview: A friendly Giant has a teleport device that can send the Spindrift crew back to Earth, but the SID use the whole thing as a trap.

episodes.name: The Deadly Dart
episodes.overview: Mark is framed for the murder of two Giants and begins acting suspiciously, turning his crewmates against him.

episodes.name: Doomsday
episodes.overview: The Earthlings become involved in a sabotage scheme to destroy the nearby city.

episodes.name: A Small War
episodes.overview: A sadistic child unleashes his mechanical toys on the hapless Earthlings.

episodes.name: The Marionettes
episodes.overview: The Earthlings aid an injured puppeteer by pretending to be his dancing puppets, but the owner soon suspects they are involved and prepares to capture them for the reward.

episodes.name: Wild Journey
episodes.overview: Using a device stolen from time-travelling researchers, Steve and Dan return to the day of the Spindrift's launch and try to alter history and stop the ill-fated flight.

episodes.name: Graveyard of Fools
episodes.overview: The Earthlings become involved with twin brothers who are plotting to take over the planet.
